name: Aunty
power: Damn kiasu. Look at the first 3 dream cards in the dream pile and buy 1 dream at the discounted price of $200k

name: NSF
power: Defend your nation and do 10 pushups to protect 2 dreams for 1 round

name: PSLE Top Scorer
power: Tuition fees. Discard any action card from your hand to protect all your dreams for 1 round

name: Influencer
power: Sponsorship. Take a photo of this message, post to Instagram with hashtag #discordtsd and choose a player to buy you a dream.

name: Ah Beng
power: O$P$. Force a player to give you a cash card of their choice from their bank. Dreams cannot be taken as cash
dreams: Get BTO flat on first try

name: High Flyer
power: Year end bonus. Take a cash card from the discard pile.

name: Hawker
power: Morning wet market - draw the top 3 cards from the action pile and keep 1

name: Air Stewardess
power: Coffee or tea? - Choose to draw 1 card from the action pile OR pick 1 cash card from the discard pile

name: Insurance Agent
power: Peek at target player’s hand and swap 1 card
